name: Chinese Glass Noodle Soup
author: Marcia
ingredients: 2 tablespoons thin strips fresh ginger root
2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into 1/2-inch strips
1  jalapeno pepper, cut into 8 thin slices
directions: Soak the bean threads in a large bowl of hot water until soft, about 15 minutes; drain and cut into bite-size lengths
Bring the chicken broth, garlic, ginger, and lemongrass to a boil in a large saucepan; reduce heat to medium-low and cook the mixture at a simmer until fragrant, about 15 minutes
Add the chicken and shrimp to the soup; simmer until the chicken pieces are cooked through, 3 to 5 minutes
Stir the lime juice and fish sauce through the soup
Ladle the soup over the noodles; top with jalapeno pepper slices and cilantro to serve
